brand.name: Chang Thong Thaimassage
brand.tagline: Your sanctuary for authentic Thai healing and relaxation.

hero.title: Experience Authentic Thai Relaxation
hero.description: Discover the art of traditional healing and restore your body's natural balance at our tranquil sanctuary.

about.bio1: With three years of dedicated practice in massage and holistic wellness, I am passionate about promoting deep relaxation and harmony through authentic techniques. I believe that true well-being comes from balancing the body and mind.
about.bio2: My commitment to professional excellence is driven by continuous learning. I have undergone specialized training in Germany and hold certifications in advanced modalities, including Thai Royal Advance and Thai Flow Massage, as well as soothing Aroma Massage and traditional Hawaiian Lomi Lomi Nui Massage.
about.bio3: Every treatment is delivered with care, respect, and a focus on your individual needs.

credits.intro: We value intellectual property rights and want to give proper credit to the creators of the images used on our website.
credits.freepikText: Several images on this website are sourced from Freepik, a platform offering high-quality graphic resources.
credits.aiGeneratedText: Some images on this website have been created using artificial intelligence models to achieve specific visual concepts.
credits.deeptissueImg: <0>Deep Tissue Massage:</0> Image by <1>javi_indy on Freepik</1>
credits.lomilomiImg: <0>Lomi-Lomi Massage:</0> Image generated by AI from Gemini.
credits.licenseText: All images from Freepik are used in accordance with Freepik's free license terms, which require attribution. We are grateful to the talented designers and photographers who make their work available. AI-generated images are created as original content for this website.
credits.footerNote: If you are a copyright holder and believe any content on this site infringes your rights, please contact us immediately and we will address the issue promptly.

treatments.title: Our Massage Treatments
treatments.subtitle: Professional Thai massages for your well-being – with transparent pricing and flexible time options.

flowmassage.title: Thai Flowmassage
flowmassage.description: A harmonious combination of gentle stretches and rhythmic pressure techniques. This traditional massage promotes circulation, releases tension, and brings body and mind into balance.

antistress.title: Anti-Stress Massage
antistress.description: Specially designed to reduce stress and promote deep relaxation. This massage combines calming techniques that help you let go and recharge your energy.

deeptissue.title: Deep Tissue Massage
deeptissue.description: Intensive massage targeting deep muscle layers. Ideal for chronic tension and pain – promotes regeneration and improves mobility.

lomilomi.title: Lomi-Lomi Massage
lomilomi.description: The traditional Hawaiian temple massage – flowing, wave-like movements that harmonize the entire body. A holistic experience for deep relaxation and inner balance.

footmassage.title: Foot Massage
footmassage.description: A revitalizing treatment for tired feet and heavy legs. This massage combines gentle stretching with the stimulation of specific reflex points to improve circulation and restore your natural energy flow.

about.title: The Art of Thai Wellness
about.paragraph1: Our story is rooted in the rich traditions of Thai healing. We are committed to providing an authentic and rejuvenating experience, using time-honored techniques passed down through generations to promote harmony and balance in body, mind, and spirit.
about.paragraph2: At Chang Thong Thaimassage, every treatment is a journey towards wellness, guided by our expert therapists in a sanctuary of peace and tranquility.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from those who have experienced the serenity and healing at our spa.

items.author: Jessica L.
items.text: An absolutely transcendent experience. The traditional Thai massage was authentic and incredibly effective. I left feeling completely renewed.

items.author: Mark T.
items.text: The ambiance is so peaceful and the staff are wonderful. The aromatherapy massage was the best I've ever had. Highly recommend!

items.author: Sarah P.
items.text: From the moment I walked in, I felt relaxed. The attention to detail is amazing. The foot reflexology was a dream.

footer.tagline: Your sanctuary for authentic Thai healing and relaxation.
